The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 November is 1,229,140 (2,183.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 November, there were 154,368 new confirmed cases (274.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 November, there were 140,221 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 10% ( 14,147 extra cases).
